general: This morning, a competitive energy manifests, dear Aries, as Mars stirs in your eleventh solar house. Be cautious of peers who may attempt to overshadow you to pursue their own desires. Avoid fueling tensions that could leave you feeling restless. The atmosphere intensifies with the full moon in Leo, thereby unleashing your creative potential. Step back from current events, trends, and popular culture to rediscover your voice. Draw your inspiration from what truly resonates with you, rather than trying to blend into the collective. Embracing authentic interests will allow your heart to flourish.
love: Take the time to listen to your partner's desires; this will strengthen your bond.
work: Leverage your creativity to stand out at work; do not hesitate to propose new ideas.
health: Engage in relaxing activities to soothe your restless mind.
advice: Stay true to yourself to shine.
